sentence.Network_en: Their sporting reputation has suffered enormously from Johnson's exposure.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于约翰逊东窗事发，他们的体育声誉受到了严重损害。

sentence.Network_en: Having the right equipment at hand will be enormously helpful.
sentence.Network_cn: 手头上有合适的设备将会帮上大忙。

sentence.Network_en: The number of calories in different brands of drinks varies enormously.
sentence.Network_cn: 不同牌子的饮料所含的卡路里数大不相同。

entry.def: Something that is enormous is extremely large in size or amount.

example.ex: There is, of course, an enormous amount to see.

entry.def: You can use enormous to emphasize the great degree or extent of something.

auth_sentence.content: We were enormously proud of what he had achieved.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were enormously proud of what he had achieved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were enormously proud of what he had achieved.

auth_sentence.content: The Chinese are enormously proud of their historical achievements.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Chinese are enormously proud of their historical achievements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Chinese are enormously proud of their historical achievements.

auth_sentence.content: Losses on each flight varied enormously during the war.
auth_sentence.res_content: Losses on each flight varied enormously during the war.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Losses on each flight varied enormously during the war.

Sentence.sentence: But over the next few decades labour forces in rich countries are set to shrink so much that inflows of immigrants would have to increase enormously to compensate: to at least twice their current size in western Europe's most youthful countries, and three times in the older ones.

sentences.en: He helped me enormously with advice on how to do ideological work.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我怎样做思想工作,对我有很大帮助。

sentences.en: His research has contributed enormously to our understanding of this disease.
sentences.cn: 他的研究对我们认识这一疾病贡献很大。
